attributes.comment:
Please reconsider raising the fees for the adoption paperwork and processing we
have to file to adopt an orphan. In most cases, we really are saving a life, and the
costs are already very high. Consider alternatives of how to save money instead of
raising fees. Efficiency in your agency along with streamlining the adoption
paperwork would save you much more money than the proposed fees will ever
raise for you. Ask any adoptive parent where there is waste of time and money in
your agency and you will begin to understand where to start. If the fees continue
to rise, many families who struggle to adopt will be forced not to adopt due to the
costs alone. That could cost a child a life he or she could have had. Is that worth
any amount of money? I think not.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Adoptive Parent
